gemini.instruction: Analyze the feasibility of WO-116 (Strict Settlement Refactor). Review `InheritanceManager`, `MAManager`, `FinanceDepartment`, `TickScheduler`, and `Government` to see if strictly enforcing `SettlementSystem` usage is structurally sound. Identify any circular dependencies (e.g. Bank vs Govt vs Settlement), logic gaps, or 'God Class' entanglements that make this refactor overly risky or impossible. Output a feasibility report.

jules.title: WO-116_PhaseA_Component_Purity
jules.instruction: Execute WO-116 Phase A ONLY. 1. Refactor `InheritanceManager`, `MAManager`, `FinanceDepartment`, and `Bank.check_solvency` to use `SettlementSystem.transfer` instead of direct mutations. 2. DO NOT modify `TickScheduler`. 3. Verify with `verify_great_reset_stability.py`.

git_review.instruction: DTO Purity Gate 초기 구현분 검토
